name: candle
procedure: melt the wax, add the fragrance with essential oils, place the wick and pour the wax in mold and wait for it , to make it strong.

name: room freshner
procedure: fill the bottle 80% and then add 10-12 drops of any essential oil you like, and then add decorative flowers in it, shake it whenever you use them.

name: soap
procedure: boil the soap base and add the natural herbs like neem, alovera etc in it, and pour it into the soap silicon mold and then let it be cool for a day.
